author: richoppong
title: Flood Africa with Cardano
description: Most Africans are unaware of Cardano and its opportunities as a world-changing technology.

f6_assessments.q0:
This proposal is basically an Ad Campaign, targeting a specific African region (Ghana) with a combination of IRL Billboard Advertising plus animated YouTube Content to go with it. These efforts are a good fit for the Challenge and would doubtless raise awareness of Cardano in this region of Africa - many people may never "Stumble across" a website, but they definitely walk/drive down the road! 
I am only giving a 4 for impact because I am just dying to see - what would these billboards look like? What is the INFO in the Infographic?? Even if it were a rough draft, some evidence of what we are buying here would really solidify my confidence in the IMPACT proposal.
f6_assessments.q1:
The two man team represented here looks to have the correct background and experience to do what they are claiming. I appreciate the LinkedIn profile links with appropriate work experience evedenced. Again, some examples of their work and vision specific to this project would strengthen my confidence in the feasibility. 

Of some concern is that there seems to be a budgetary gap as it relates to the outcomes of the campaign. Specifically, they mention aiming to take 5+ calls per day in response to Billboard call to action. Who is taking these calls? Are they getting paid? If successful, 5+ calls a day (could it be more??) has the potential to be a significant investment of somebody's time to take those calls, and this is not explained or addressed anywhere in the budget. 
It's not actually clear what the call to action  on the billboard would be, either. There are lots of interesting ways to "onboard" people to Cardano, and I'm looking for a little more detail about the "What".
f6_assessments.q2: Some of the pieces are auditable (5 billboards and 10 educative videos, 1000+ youtube views) but others are quite squishy, such as 50 new members onboarded to Project Catalyst..... I'm sure Catalyst WILL grow by more than 50 members in the next six months, but how would those be tracked to this effort?  The auditability section is actually the only place that all these "Calls" are mentioned, and it's a bit out of no where. Who are they calling? What are they calling about? What is the outcome of all these calls?

f6_assessments.q0: Flood Africa with Cardano is an interesting idea to develop the Cardano community in Ghana in particular and in Africa in general. It is essential to create outdoor billboards to increase awareness of Cardano in the area. This will contribute to the growth of Cardano in the Ghana region. However, I think the impact of this will not be high because creating billboards for propaganda is quite passive. It will not be able to keep the community fully informed about Cardano. On the other hand, the cost of this is quite large, the long-term and far-reaching impact on the community is not high. Blockchain is a very new field, the dissemination of knowledge needs to be continuous. What's more, Cardano is a rapidly evolving platform that needs constant knowledge updates for the community to keep up. It is necessary to regularly update all Cardano activities to help the community go with Cardano in the long run.
f6_assessments.q1: I know that Richmond Oppong and David Daniel Lezu are great members of the Cardano community. I believe that with my experience and skills, you will do well on this proposal. However, you need to include other risks that could lead to this proposal not being successful and your solutions. Example: You will create videos to spread the word to the community but how can you get them to watch these videos? If they don't know about your videos, what will you do?
f6_assessments.q2: The roadmap you give also needs to be clearer and more specific so that the community can follow your work. For example: After 3 months, what will you achieve? What work will be completed after 6 months? You also need a channel to update the work progress to the community. The use of the proposed budget of $9000 I find you very transparent and clear. I greatly appreciate this. The KPIs you give are also completely easy to measure. I believe the community also appreciates the above.

f6_assessments.q0: Great ideas that has the potential to reach out a number of people. I think that idea can be expanded to include handbills that can  give out or depend at vantage point for pickup indeed billboards will give some bits and pieces of information to people. The information on YouTube is also loud able but how will you reach the target population. It will be great if you outline how you intend to reach out to the target population. The proposal can be scaled to include reach out target group via social media.
f6_assessments.q1: This proposal clearly outlines a workable budget and a great team with the relevant resources and skills to execute the job. Has a budget that can execute the task and falls within. The metrics to be achieved are verifiable. The proposal has envisioned a challenge with local government authorities and proposal a laudable solution.
f6_assessments.q2: The time line provided coupled with the road map makes the proposal auditable. The deliverable is clear and can be verified. The explanation and information provided depicts that the proposer has a clear understanding of the budget matter and has provide a solution that will make impact in the Cardano ecosystem.

f6_assessments.q0: This is a good proposal to advertise cardano for adoption, I think the team could have explain more about how they gonna use video on YouTube to educate i.e providing curriculum on the various educational materials that would be used. All in all I think this is good proposal that when gotten funded can be implemented.
f6_assessments.q1: The team is well experienced to carry out this project, links attached is valid and shows how experienced the team is to carry out the project. However the team should have provided a detailed budget of marketing allocating since it's gonna be a new YouTube page.
f6_assessments.q2:
Roadmap is well structured 
 within 3 months. Hence I believe the team can't handle to carry out the project alone. I think there should be someone who would be able to do translation to local dialect since it wasn't included in the deliverables.

f6_assessments.q0:
This is a great idea to visibly engage the public on via such advertised billboards and audio-visuals.

This advertising-education approach is missing in the space could add a new angle for the majority of citizens to be curious to learn more on blockchain.
f6_assessments.q1:
The cute individual description of the team and experience show they are prepared to undertake this proposal to ensure the deliverables are achieved. The activities are in two phases and very much clear of what they are to do. I will suggest the timelines of the milestones are broken down properly. For example, the billboard should be known whether it will be mounted in the second month or the video animation will be ready in the third month. That means designing would also take another month. Again, 5 advertising spaces will be rented but the duration for the rent is also not indicated. Renting the space for 3 months or 12 months is important to justify the allocated cost. 

The budget is also showing cost of each part and item and looks clear how the funds will be administered.
f6_assessments.q2:
The roadmap and the metrics are excellent. The proposers have made measurable projections and look very realistic. 
But receiving more than 5+ calls in day on the billboards to me is not that realistic and for how long would that take place?  
All the other KPIs are achievable making the auditing very easy.

f6_assessments.q0:
The problem described here is a critical issue of the challenge, hence there is an alignment.
Africa is mostly referred to as a deprived continent living in the shadow of opportunities (in order words not having access to opportunities), a proposal of this nature is offering a very bright opportunity to Africans to get to know about Cardano and the opportunities available. The proposal is a very big win for Cardano. It demonstrates how it would bring value to the ecosystem by using billboard advertisements and video animations to draw the attention of people. The goals are in alignment with the challenge setting.
The proposal is effective for addressing the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1:
I am confident that the team is up to the task (well equipped) per the information and relevant experience provided. The budget provided is well explained and I believe it’s reasonable for achieving the desired outcome. The plan and timeline presented here are concise. I like the fact that the risk foreseen has to do with local government antagonism towards the project, because it’s mostly one of the challenges in some parts of Ghana.
I am happy this has been captured by the proposer.
f6_assessments.q2: What I see about the roadmap, milestones and time horizon is that they are written in few words however, they are concise and effective for achievement. The metrics/KPIs employed in the proposal are good indicators for evaluating the success of the proposal as they tell the number of members onboarded to Project Catalyst amongst others over the stipulated period. The targeted problem described here is clear with a solution I believe addresses the problem.

f6_assessments.q0:
The use of billboards in educating and creating awareness about Cardano and Catalyst as articulated in this proposal is phenomenal. People in the world today have short attention spans. We want things now, and we don’t have a lot of time to look for information. The team behind this proposal have taken the right approach in tackling the problem of relaying information to the busy ones who may not have enough time to research on Cardano and its' opportunities. Personally, I have witnessed the impact of infographics education and it's amazing. It makes learning very easy as the audience have just little time to consume a lot of information phrased in a simple sentence and imagery.
This proposal talks about the use of YouTube channel to host animations designed to educate viewers about Cardano blockchain but there's lack of information on what the length of this video is going to be as well as the various topics under Cardano that the animations will be based on.
Although information like the various topics that these billboards would be showcasing would've been amazing, I agree that this proposal addresses the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1:
This proposal is written very simple and in a plain language. It points out exactly what the community must expect and when exactly to expect delivery. The goal of having 5 billboards mounted and 10 video animation contents to YouTube at 3 months post-funding seems feasible to me. However, I think the team should've done a good job to provide information on whether or not the YouTube channel has been created already. If the channel is not created yet, then it could've been a great milestone added to the already listed milestones.
This leads me to talk about the budget of this proposal. The budget of this proposal seems to cater for everything except translation of contents to Akan and maintenance of YouTube channel. The team can improve on this proposals' feasibility by including a budget for translation of contents to Akan and YouTube maintenance as they're key milestones mentioned.
The proposing team is noted to have about 70% experience in implementing this proposal successfully if funded. I say 70% because it looks like none of the team members have expressed expertise in YouTube management which is also a key role needed to help reach this proposals' goals.
Moreover, detailed information about the curricula needed for successful implementation, be it billboard education or YouTube would've been great information to assess whether or not this proposal is going to feasibly have an impact.
Therefore, I neither agree nor disagree that this proposal can feasibly be implemented.
f6_assessments.q2: This proposal has quantitative metrics and it is a good step in ensuring that the community can transparently audit it's progress. The success look-alike of this proposal is clearly defined in its metrics whilst the solution clearly describes an understandable targeted problem. I strongly agree that this proposal provides me with sufficient information to assess the progress in attaining its stated goals.

f6_assessments.q0: I think this proposal is laudable in the sense that it is targeted at throwing more lights(exposure) about cardano blockchain technology and its opportunities to the ordinary African by means of communication/commercial tools such as the billboards,signages,animations on social media platforms to get more of Africans on board to improve their standards of living and also positively affect the cardano ecosystem.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposal can be implemented successfully with regards to the team structure of expertise and also the local language content that would be used in the communication materials will make it simple for individuals to relate and understand since its first 3 months implementation starts in Ghana.
The budget is reasonable enough and has been indicated clearly what each amount would be used for during execution.
f6_assessments.q2: Communication tools as indicated in the proposal i.e (5 billboards, 10 animation created videos, 100s of populace educated, 1000+ views etc on YouTube and other social platforms determines the success of the proposal(project).

f6_assessments.q0:
The problem described in this proposal is aligned with the challenge as it's one of the initiatives that contribute to seed and grow Cardano in Africa. 
The proposal considers to start as a pilot project in the geographical area of Accra (city), in Ghana (country), what may produce some learnings from which the proposers may scale up this initiative in other part of the continent.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposers team is formed by specialist in web development, graphic design, technologists, and a particular interest in blockchain. These elements are assets for the team to be successful in such a proposal.
Also, the team will be getting support from Wada, which is a recognized organization in the Cardano blockchain working with local developers and entrepreneurs to build decentralized applications and businesses of the future. However, there's no mention about the content of the billboards neither the Youtube animation. These will be developed by who? What would be the content?
The time frame is vague as it doesn't specify the succession of the steps of the project implementation process.
The budget is detailed and covers various resources needs.
f6_assessments.q2:
The results of this proposal are physical and may be noticed by whoever interested in evaluation and follow-up of the project results, including the Cardano community. 
The delivery date as mentioned previously is vague and doesn't detail different steps of the  implementation.
At least 50 people are expected to join the Cardano, but there's no information on the procedure to be used by those interested people on joining, and as assessor, evaluator and community member, we wouldn't assume how this would be done.
The no By-in of the local government may be a great challenge for this project implementation . Wouldn't be advisable to have a phase within the project to educate the local government to get them onboard?

f6_assessments.q1:
It seems quite feasible this proposal. 

One of things that caught my attention is the price of the billboard rental. These prices varies according to time (how long it’ll stay there) and location (crowded avenues or nowhere farms). Is the pricing in Ghana something like this? This kind of information is important to know if the budget is coherent. 

Another informations that could’ve been added are: 1) Video’s time (is it going to be small videos?); 2) who is going to write the content (seen the experience, you’ve made clear that creating the video is not the problem, however it’s not easy to pass a dense content in a few minutes with clarity and in an interesting way. Therefore, you might think about hiring someone.
f6_assessments.q2:
A thing that caught my attention are the first bullet (50 members onboarded to Project Catalyst) and the second one (100s of populace educated[…]). How are you going to differentiate the growing of catalyst project because other causes and from your project? And the same goes to the Wanda Hub.
Maybe if you add a survey during the Wada Hub and, for the catalyst project, maybe creating an emailing list after the fund begins asking if they’re participating.

It would be nice to have a detailed roadmap as well, with different milestones. You’ve added your goal at the end of 3 months. But during this period, how are we going to evaluate? Maybe create a platform where you can share everything (creating of billboard, installation, etc.). The youtube videos is quite easy to verify IF there is a link shared with us in some place (maybe the platform).

f6_assessments.q0: Marvelous, this proposal seek to do something new in the community in regards to adoption of the Cardano blockchain. However would have like to see pictures of how the team is gonna execute the project. Overall great proposal and also address the  challenge.
f6_assessments.q1: Given that this team is well experience in their various fields of work, Wada has a good reputation and the requisite experience to make this project a success. The budget is well breakdown and I think funds requested is feasible to complete the project.
f6_assessments.q2: Been identified with problem statement and providing solution to it, I think links provided is adequate enough. I think they have well layout plan to carryout this project given the timeline on the roadmap.

f6_assessments.q0:
This proposal mentions most Africans are unaware of Cardano and its opportunities as a world-changing technology. The solution is projecting Cardano Blockchain Tech. & its opportunities via Billboard advertisements & video animations on various social media platforms.
They have articulated exactly how they are going to make use of the infographics mode of learning to drive Cardano adoption in Africa in their proposed solution and this puts our proposal in good alignment with this challenge setting.

Although the connectivity uses on using digital platform like YouTube, due to poor internet in certain part of Ghana, billboard can best serve the need of scaling up awareness. The use of billboards would help bring Catalyst opportunities to individuals with low internet connectivity and even those whose internet interactions would not normally expose them to blockchain activities.

The impact on a large scale will help not only all countries in Africa but also the Cardano community to grow stronger.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposal provides a detailed plan of actions after 3 months, including: mount 5 billboard with educational content on Cardano and Project Catalyst,
also provide 10 video animation content to YouTube to educate the local community (in both English and Akan). The project also provides a website where interested people can track progress on the website: www.wada.org
The personnel implementing this plan have extensive experience in the field of graphic design which can give the initiative and feasibility to this proposal.
f6_assessments.q2:
The following metrics will show the reader how effective the project is:
50 members onboarded to Project Catalyst by the end of 3 months (new ideascale accounts)
100s of populace education about Cardano Blockchain (Wada Ghana Hub event attendance)

1000+ views of animation content on YouTube
5+ calls per day to be received from billboard advertising
What does success for this project look like?
Number of billboards mounted (goal 5)
Number of educative animations created (goal 10)Number of calls received from individuals inquiring for more details seen on billboard
Number of YouTube views (1000+)
The proposal provides specific grounds, ensuring impact, feasibility and transparency, helping readers see the successful future of the project in the chain of great impacts from the Cardano community in Africa.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal identifies a problem within the challenge and has suggested a strategy to address it. As this challenge is about  growing cardano in Africa, growing awareness through visual means can catch some attention. the proposal can also be tweaked when necessary to adapt to future challenges.
f6_assessments.q1: Given the plan and the experience of the individuals involved, it is possible to implement. However, the local government challenge can take quite long to resolve so the 3 months period might be a little short to be able to execute the proposal properly.
f6_assessments.q2: The information provided does not provide enough details for audit. The listed expenditure only covers payment to direct labour, banner and billboard but there will be definitely other costs like educating the local government authorities and even seeking permission to mount the billboards amongst others that have not been mentioned and accounted for.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal is in alignment with the challenge. It suggests use of bill boards and video animations to scale-up awareness of Cardano Blockchain Tec and its opportunities as the new trend of technology. It’s a pilot project intended to create local impact in Accra, with prospects of expanding it through Ghana and the rest of Africa. The project has potential for scalability.
f6_assessments.q1: The 9 years plus of team experience is reasonable for the kind of work and its in alignment wit the objectives of the project. The activities and the time frame are defined, the budget is explained and risks are taken into consideration. The potential outcome of the proposal surpasses the potential risks.
f6_assessments.q2: KPIs, roadmap and millstones are defined. However the delivery dates are not defined.

f6_assessments.q0: The aim of this project is to make the population aware of the possibilities of Cardano. The proposal states that they will do this by making billboards and building a YouTube channel. It is good to build billboards with information about Cardano because this also makes people without internet aware about the possibilities of Cardano. Because this team is based in Ghana, the intention is to conduct a test study in the areas of Accra and Ghana. This proposal could have an impact on Cardano if the project could expand further into other areas and put up more billboards. As a risk, the local government may oppose this project. It is good to try and convince the government that there are great benefits to blockchain technology.
f6_assessments.q1: The team consists of a web designer (David Daniel Lezu) and a graphic designer (Richmond Oppon). Richmond has 6 years of experience as a graphic designer at Wada. David is a web designer with 3 years of useful experience and also works for Wada. A general overview has been given where the money from the financing will be given. The price of the billboard rental seems quite high to me. A further subdivision can be made in which the working hours of the different team members are stated. With this budget it seems possible to make the project a success. It is only indicated that this project will take 3 months. The location where the billboards will hang is not shown. It would be good to show the general themes that will be implemented in the video animations. Sufficient challenges and risks have been included that are relevant for a good start of the project. It will be especially important to convince the local government.
f6_assessments.q2: The progress of the project will be measured by means of clear KPIs. The views on YouTube and the 5 calls per day on the billboard ad are clearly measurable. I wonder how you are going to measure and whether this project will make people sign up for ideascale. The statistics that ensure that you can see that this is a success are included. I would try to make more educational animations. If in the long term this project would grow, they can always be used. It has also been stated to have over 1000 views. I think you should definitely aim for 5000 views here. This project can make people aware of the possibilities of Cardano by means of the billboards and YouTube channel.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposals strongly aligns with the challenge and I am really very positive about the plan in this proposal, the idea of putting up bill boards to extent the reach of cardano to people aside of the internet makes sense, makes sense due to the bad internet in some parts of Africa ( Ghana) and also the initiative of videos on YouTube also extent the reach of cardano to so many people and can easily be monitored number of views and if there is progress, I like this proposal , and it has a high potential of scaling in the future in the cardano ecosystem, I would say yes to this and find this proposal good .
f6_assessments.q1:
Number of team members being 2 is totally fine for this project since it does not require so much team members and since both team members have the requisite experience already for this kind of project execution then I would say the team is ready and up to the task,
With the provision of links to visit is also really impressive and this is what should not be missing out in a good proposal. 
A timeline stating how long it would be taken for the team to execute this project has being made clear and also the roadmap , I commend the team for this hardwork , not forgetting the budget, I think is clear and the amount needed for such a project is totally reasonable and the fact that the team took time to break down the budget into smaller components for understanding is very satisfactory and shows that the team exactly knows what they are about and how they intend to spend every dollar on the project, well done to the team members, good proposal.
f6_assessments.q2: The roadmap , milestone and time horizon are well presented and that’s really very brilliant. Also some strengths of this proposal is how the team has outlined the metrics that defines success . In response to this I would say the team is really prepared to execute this project even withstanding the challenges they foresee.  Am of the strong believe that when this proposal is funded it would bring cardano awareness to people very quick and hence be a hit for the cardano ecosystem. The team should keep it up even for their next proposals, I find this proposal good and laudable .

f6_assessments.q0:
This proposal clearly aligns with the challenge,"how do we continue to seed and grow cardano in Africa".The idea in the proposal to me is a brilliant one. Advertising the cardano blockchain on billboards will help create awareness to the general public. Creating attractive billboards projecting cardano will also attract more individuals into the cardano ecosystem thereby growing the numbers in cardano.
Also, creating content about cardano on digital platforms like YouTube will also help scale awareness,hence when people are aware about cardano ,there is the likelihood that most people will  be eager to be part of the cardano ecosystem.
This proposal is therefore an interesting one and I believe will add more value and impact  on the cardano ecosystem. This project in the proposal in essence will encourage development in the cardano ecosystem in the sense that,if more people are aware of the cardano ecosystem,more people will be willing to join and this means having more people taking up roles in project catalyst like proposers, community advisers and others,thereby increasing and adding more value to the cardano blockchain.
f6_assessments.q1:
I believe this proposal has the potential to be implemented if funded. This proposal will certainly increase the number of people wanting to be part of the cardano ecosystem. This proposal clearly has the traits of turning into an impactful proposal if funded.
Again,the budget has been taken into consideration and is very detailed. The budget has been broken down and allocated to each purpose which is reasonable to me. I have soo much confidence in the team just for the fact that,they plan to educate people with both the local languages and the English language. This will aid in clearer understanding of the content about the cardano blockchain.
Lastly, the proposal clearly defined a well experienced team. Their experience is clearly explained and detailed in the proposal. The team has also worked with wada,a reputable organization in the cardano ecosystem and such experiences are real and genuine as I have see their works through the links they provided in the proposal. I have no doubts that if this proposal is funded,it will have tremendous impact on the cardano blockchain.
f6_assessments.q2: The team clearly defines the milestones they intend to reach for the progress of the project to be measured. With the information given, about 50 members getting onboarded onto project catalyst,that is by creating accounts, this is a direct way of measuring the success of the project if funded. The KPIs are clearly stated and measurable. With the KPIs listed in the proposal , the team clearly knows what they intend to achieve and also aim at achieving. But then one thing lost from the auditability of this proposal is that the delivery dates are not clearly defined. I would advise that, the team should do well to provide us with well defined delivery dates if their proposal is funded.

f6_assessments.q0: The goal of the 'Grow Africa, Grow Cardano' challenge is to raise Cardano awareness in Africa, and this proposal illustrates that goal. Through billboards and animations, the proposer has come up with some creative methods to accomplish so. According to research, info graphics are a simple and an effective way to understand complex subjects. Most people in our area of the globe are drawn to things that are visually appealing and engaging, so the use of infographics as a style of learning might be a long-term endeavor in Africa, grabbing a major percentage of an important rising market. This proposal illustrates Cardano tech use-case solutions in a straightforward and concise manner. As a consequence, I am certain that this proposal is successful in addressing the issue.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer is one who has shown over the period his knowledge and expertise in block chain specifically Cardano as well as Logo Designs, Print & Poster Designs, 3D Signage, Mounting of Billboard, Web Designs and 3D Animations and has the necessary abilities to carry out the plan. she also knows the kind and number of team members needed to carry out the plan especially with the peculiar kind of expertise needed, and gives a budget that is clear, broken down into pieces, and acceptable in order to meet the established objectives. The proposal also includes a realistic timeframe for completing the work, as well as a clear and actionable implementation strategy that demonstrates what is being done and how it is being done. The proposer has taken into account the challenges that may arise during implementation and important aspect considering the proposal and country he resides in and suggested possible solutions. Thus, problem solution listed has a high chance being implemented successfully
f6_assessments.q2: A timeframe and milestones are included in the proposal, as well as metrics and key performance indicators (KPIs) that define the proposal's success. The suggestion provides a clear description of the problem as well as a solution that solves the problem in the same way. Thus, the information provided is sufficient to audit the progress and the success of the proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal addresses effectively the challenge. The proposal seeks to educate the public on Cardano and the benefits of joining the community. This uses animations and billboards that will catch the eye of people adding value to the Cardano ecosystem. A key problem has been addressed also if the proposal is funded. The local government may go against it. There is a solution put in place ti ensure that this is taken care of in case it arises. The key metrics align with that of the challenge setting.
f6_assessments.q1: The information about the team described in the proposal is detailed, the experiences described and the work already performed indicate that the team is fully capable of developing this work. The budget describes 5 items that are pertinent to the success of the proposal. Given the experience and the plan presented it is likely this proposal will be implemented successfully.
f6_assessments.q2: There is a detailed explanation of the budget and has been put in chronological order. The achievement metrics have been laid out to measure the success of the proposal is a success. The goals have been outlined and are in line with the campaign setting and have been stated. The information provided is sufficient to audit the progress and the success of the proposal.

f6_assessments.q0:
In the proposal, most Africans are not awae of Cardano. The proposal wants to project Cardano blockchain through bill boards adverts and video animations. Solution to the problem is going to rely on 100% infographics. 
To address the challenge, this proposal states that it is a clear reflection of this challenge of seeding and growing Cardano in Africa. They will use billboards, videos and YouTubes to create more awareness to many Africans.
The proposal states that the main risk is that the Local Government may challenge the legality of blockchain in Ghana and Africa. They provided the solution that they will educate the authorities before mounting billboards. This proposal effectively addresses the challenge so my rating is 4.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposal has stated that they will use 3 months to implement. They will mount bill boards with educational content on Cardano and project catalyst. They will provide 10 video animation 
(in English and Akan), among others.
The budget breakdown is clear and shows details 

The proposal states that they ill use 3 months to complete the proposal. They will mount bill boards with educational content on 

The proposal has stated that the project will take 3  and months to complete. They will mount bill boards with educational content on Cardano and Project catalyst.
The budget is showing details of breakdown into rental of billboard, printing and others. 
The team is made up of two experts in web design and graphic design- Daniel and Richmond- mentioned in the proosal and they are capable of implementing the proposal successfully.
f6_assessments.q2: In measuring the progress and success of this proposal, the details show that 50 members are expected to be onboarded, number of billboards, number of educative animations, number of Youtube watched , among others, are all sufficient to audit the proposal . My rating is 4 because this is a good proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: Cardano blockchain and its privileges are massive, yet little known about it, especially in the part of Accra, therefore I believe this initiative will provide much wider awareness to people and why they need to get along with Cardano blockchain.
f6_assessments.q1: success for this project is a massive yes, With much experience in 3D designs and infographics I believe this project will be enrolled successfully, and again having a lot of work done on Billboards mounting and other animation works I trust this will be completed successfully thereby moving Cardano blockchain to a wider global scale.
f6_assessments.q2: Based on the information enumerated from the project, I can deduce that, if this very idea is carried out well it will expand the exposure of the Cardano blockchain to masses of people and bring people to the catalyst platform. again I think much more people will be needed than as stated thus its budget should be relooked at

f6_assessments.q0:
One of the major ways to broadcast the Blockchain gospel is through marketing. That is why I am so much interested in this proposal because it gives a clear solution on how to advertise and market the issues of Cardano in Africa starting from Accra, Ghana.

The proposal is projected to be implemented across Africa. Research shows that infographics are an easy and efficient mechanism for learning sophisticated concepts. Hence, our solution to this problem is going to rely on 100% infographics. ie. still images and video animations.

They propose to mount 5 billboards by the end of 3 months of post funding. And simultaneously, we will be building animations to educate our target audience on Cardano blockchain and its opportunities. These animations will be posted on our YouTube channel (linked through QR code on our billboard). This so commendable. It will help market Cardano and Blockchain in general.



I also noted that the impact of the billboard advertisement may not be directly seen as compared to the YouTube animations. However it exposes our content to a much wider audience, and w
they have found that advertisements on billboards add significant credibility and visibility to local businesses. This will be a suitable solution to the problem stated in this proposal.
f6_assessments.q1:
There is vital information about the team described in the proposal is detailed, this is laudable and commendable, the experiences described and the
work already performed indicate that the team is fully capable of developing this work.  
The total budget of $ 9000 sought for by the team is worth commending. It will be clear that it can be put to judicious use.
f6_assessments.q2: One of the things that makes a good proposal are the Key Performance Indicators. I believe in the work that the proposers have done in this proposal. The metrics and KPIs were well chosen and I believe they are good indicators for evaluating success.
